SKILL_NAME: the Dabble Lab Airtable Example Template
WELCOME: Welcome to {}. What would you like to do?
WELCOME_REPROMPT: Welcome to {}. What would you like to do?
ADD_RECORD: To add a new record, please tell me the name of the person.
NAME_CONFIRMED: Okay. Now please tell me {}'s favourite color.
NAME_UNCONFIRMED: Sorry, I couldn't understand the name. Can you please repeat that?
NAME_UNCONFIRMED_REPROMPT: Please repeat the name of the person.
COLOR_CONFIRMED: Alright. I have successfully saved the record to the database. What would you like to do now?
COLOR_CONFIRMED_REPROMPT: What would you like to do now?
COLOR_UNCONFIRMED: Sorry, I couldn't understand the color. Can you please repeat that?
COLOR_UNCONFIRMED_REPROMPT: Please repeat the favourite of the person.
COLOR_UPDATED: I've successfully updated {}'s favorite color to {}. What else would you like to do?
COLOR_UPDATED_REPROMPT: What else would you like to do?
COLOR_NOT_UPDATED: Sorry, I couldn't understand the name and color to be updated. Can you please repeat that?
COLOR_NOT_UPDATED_REPROMPT: Please repeat the name and new favourite of the person.
GET_FAV_COLOR: {}'s favourite color is {}. Would you like to know anything else?
GET_FAV_COLOR_REPROMPT: Would you like to know anything else?
RECORD_DELETED: I've successfully deleted all the records for {}. What else would you like to do?
RECORD_DELETED_REPROMPT: What else would you like to do?
FALLBACK: Sorry, I didn't understand that. Can you please repeat?
CANCEL_STOP_RESPONSE: Okay. I'll be here if you need me.
ERROR: Sorry, I wasn't able to handle your last request. Could you say that again?
